content.body: looking at https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/15203, should `Symbol` also be included in the list _‚Äú`String`, `Array`, `TypedArray`, `Map`, and `Set` are all built-in iterables, because each of their prototype objects implements an `@@iterator` method.‚Äú_? (I guess the list is also missing `Intl.Segments`)

looking at https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/15203, should Symbol also be included in the list ‚ÄúString, Array, TypedArray, Map, and Set are all built-in iterables, because each of their prototype objects implements an @@iterator method.‚Äú? (I guess the list is also missing Intl.Segments)

content.body:
Though I did make this mistake recently when I wrongly wrote 

```
isWellKnownSymbol = v => typeof v === 'symbol' && Reflect.ownKeys(Symbol).includes(v);
```
